subject: Football
College Athletics
Football (College)
lead_paragraph: Despite erratic play from both teams, the Heisman contender Matt Barkley got into a rhythm in the second half and finished with six touchdown passes in the Trojans’ victory over the Orange.
snippet: Despite erratic play from both teams, the Heisman contender Matt Barkley got into a rhythm in the second half and finished with six touchdown passes in the Trojans’ victory over the Orange.
